Posts.Content: Hi Sarah. I'm Clare, Im 42, and I'm about 2 weeks ahead of you! I've just come after my mastectomy and also have kids: 18, 16, 12 and 6. I have been keeping a blog if you want to have a look and see how it's been for me. You are going to absolutely fine I promise you. All your worry and 3am panics are way way worse than getting on with it. Promise xxx anonappreciationofbreastcancer.wordpress.com
Posts.Title: Stage 3 breast cancer help & how to tell my children
